description:
Pants that stand up to summer hikes and treks. A nylon blend provides stretch for high-stepping on rugged trails, and is quick to dry after an unexpected stream dip or after a camp laundry load.Lightweight nylon fabric has plenty of stretch.Low-profile waistband sits comfortably under a pack.Plenty of pockets keep trail essentials close at hand.Gusseted crotch and articulated knees for comfort and mobility.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: Arc'teryx Alroy Pants - Women's
